definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: My, he's pretty stiff. Where'd you get him?
sentences.chinese: 嗐，这家伙倒是硬帮帮的，你从哪弄来的？

definition: (modal particle similar to 呢[ne5] or 啦[la1])
(modal final particle similar to 呢[ne5] or 啦[la5])
mile (unit of length equal to 1,609.344 m)/old form of modern 英里[Ying1 li3]
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale
interjection expressing disagreement, reproach or dissatisfaction
onomat. for surprise, amazement and sigh
old variant of 叫[jiao4]/ancient musical instrument similar to ocarina
